name: Dunk it again
description:
Unfortunately the current build doesn't behave here that well. Instead you can either watch the demo or play it here: https://wwwcool.github.io/dtf_training_demo/

Game made as a part of the warm-up for the game jam, which was hosted by the Russian game website DTF:

https://dtf.ru/hackathon/80786-trenirovka-basketbolnyy-brosok

Goal is to complete the level (who would have thought!). The way you complete the level differs from level to level though, so you have to figure it out (but the video spoils it)

Controls: Click anywhere on the screen, drag and release to throw a ball. Just like in Angry Birds
